meanings.definition: One who arranges or organizes items into categories or groups.
meanings.sent1: The assorter neatly placed all the toys in their respective bins.
meanings.sent2: The school librarian is an excellent assorter of books on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The assorter at the grocery store accidentally mixed up the fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent4: She was like an assorter of colors, blending them together to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The assorter's job is crucial in keeping things organized and easy to find.

meanings.definition: A machine or tool used to sort or separate items based on certain criteria.
meanings.sent1: The assorter in the factory separated the candies by color.
meanings.sent2: The post office uses an assorter to quickly sort letters by destination.
meanings.sent3: The assorter hummed happily as it sorted the coins into different compartments.
meanings.sent4: The assorter worked tirelessly, like a loyal assistant, sorting the nuts and bolts.
meanings.sent5: The assorter efficiently categorizes items, saving time and effort.
